title: For Meta, the Metaverse Isn’tSo Extra
sub_head: Deteriorating engagement with younger users on Facebook and Instagram makes it critical for Meta Platforms to look to the future now
body:
The third in a three-part series on Facebook ’s finances
Mark Zuckerberg’s desire to build a “metaverse” may well have spawned from some formative experience earlier in life, such as reading Neal Stephenson’s 1992 novel that coined the term, “Snow Crash.” But contrary to critics’ jests, that isn’t the main reason his company now has a new mission and a fresh name.
